#summary Getting Started with Android application

=== Build and Run, Hello World ===

 # Register yourself at mCruiseOn. Include the license.lic file to your classpath.
 # Download the client library [thedownloadlink mCruiseOnCarpoolLibrary.jar], include it in your Build Path
 # Create a New Android project Hello World, run it (to ensure it works)
 # Download [thedownloadlink HelloWorldActivity.java], overwrite to your Hello World, java file HelloWorldActivity.java, run it in the emulator again.

Now, you are ready to hit the javadocs for the library.
